Installation
============

Requirements
===========

* Python 3.12+
* uv for package management

Installation Methods
==================

Using uv
~~~~~~~~

.. code-block:: bash

   uv pip install bitrix24-mcp

Development Installation
=====================

For development installation:

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/kartochka/bitrix24-mcp.git
   cd bitrix24-mcp
   uv sync
